languages.text: "Слава о деяниях Леди Теодоры разошлась по Простору, воистину так. Только не думаю, что служить под столь амбициозной величиной — дело приятное..."
"Lady Theodora's deeds are renowned throughout the Expanse. But I do not think it would have been very pleasant to serve under such an ambitious figure..."
languages.original_text: "Слава о деяниях Леди Теодоры разошлась по Простору, воистину так. Только не думаю, что служить под столь амбициозной величиной — дело приятное..."

traits.locale_text: "Lady Theodora's deeds are renowned throughout the Expanse. But I do not think it would have been very pleasant to serve under such an ambitious figure..."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lady Theodora's deeds are renowned throughout the Expanse. But I do not think it would have been very pleasant to serve under such an ambitious figure..."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “西奥多拉夫人的事迹响彻整个科罗努斯扩区。不过我认为，在这样野心勃勃的人手下工作，恐怕并不是件令人愉快的事情……”
languages.original_text: "Lady Theodora's deeds are renowned throughout the Expanse. But I do not think it would have been very pleasant to serve under such an ambitious figure..."

traits.locale_text: “西奥多拉夫人的事迹响彻整个科罗努斯扩区。不过我认为，在这样野心勃勃的人手下工作，恐怕并不是件令人愉快的事情……”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Les exploits de dame Théodora sont connus dans toutes les Étendues. Cela dit, il ne devait pas être très agréable de servir sous les ordres de quelqu'un d'aussi ambitieux... »
languages.original_text: "Lady Theodora's deeds are renowned throughout the Expanse. But I do not think it would have been very pleasant to serve under such an ambitious figure..."

traits.locale_text: « Les exploits de dame Théodora sont connus dans toutes les Étendues. Cela dit, il ne devait pas être très agréable de servir sous les ordres de quelqu'un d'aussi ambitieux... »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Las hazañas de lady Theodora son conocidas en toda la Extensión, pero servir a una figura tan ambiciosa no debe de ser muy agradable...».
languages.original_text: "Lady Theodora's deeds are renowned throughout the Expanse. But I do not think it would have been very pleasant to serve under such an ambitious figure..."

traits.locale_text: «Las hazañas de lady Theodora son conocidas en toda la Extensión, pero servir a una figura tan ambiciosa no debe de ser muy agradable...».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「レディ・シオドーラの業績はエクスパンス一帯に知れ渡ってるからね。でも、あんな野心的な人物に仕える側からしたら、そんなに喜ばしいことでもないと思うよ…」
languages.original_text: "Lady Theodora's deeds are renowned throughout the Expanse. But I do not think it would have been very pleasant to serve under such an ambitious figure..."

traits.locale_text: 「レディ・シオドーラの業績はエクスパンス一帯に知れ渡ってるからね。でも、あんな野心的な人物に仕える側からしたら、そんなに喜ばしいことでもないと思うよ…」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Lady Theodoras Heldentaten sind in der gesamten Ausdehnung bekannt. Doch es kann nicht sonderlich angenehm gewesen sein, unter einer solch ehrgeizigen Frau zu dienen ..."
languages.original_text: "Lady Theodora's deeds are renowned throughout the Expanse. But I do not think it would have been very pleasant to serve under such an ambitious figure..."

traits.locale_text: "Lady Theodoras Heldentaten sind in der gesamten Ausdehnung bekannt. Doch es kann nicht sonderlich angenehm gewesen sein, unter einer solch ehrgeizigen Frau zu dienen ..."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "Lady Theodora's deeds are renowned throughout the Expanse. But I do not think it would have been very pleasant to serve under such an ambitious figure..."

languages.text: "Leydi Theodora'nın başarıları, tüm Enginlik'te meşhurdur. Gelgelelim böylesine hırslı birisinin altında hizmet etmenin pek hoş bir deneyim olduğunu sanmam..."
languages.original_text: "Lady Theodora's deeds are renowned throughout the Expanse. But I do not think it would have been very pleasant to serve under such an ambitious figure..."
